LanguageData.USH_Necroa.label: Grey Mechanites
LanguageData.USH_Necroa.description: An infection of Grey Mechanites contracted from Grey Goo or a Goo infected person. If not treated rapidly, under ideal conditions, the Goo will rapidly attack the brain causing excruciating pain and quickly killing the infected, at which point their remains will continue to be broken down as they wander as a lifeless goo puppet.
